dl.dd: At Grand Lake on Route 2. The park is 10 km ( 6 mi.) north of Highway 102, Exit 5.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: The park has 71 woodland campsites, a large picnic area, and trailer dump station. There is a small unsupervised beach on Shubenacadie-Grand Lake. Oakfield Provincial Park, just a few kilometers north, offers a large open picnic area, boat launch and beautiful sand beach ideal for family swimming.
